pages.text: There are ways to improve your brewing station to use less energy! First, make sure you're brewing in a Swamp! It's a nice and moist land filled with wonderful bugs!
A Witch's Pole helps reduce the amount of energy needed to make a brew when placed within 8 blocks of a Witch's Cauldron. Only up to 3 Poles will give the effect.
Wonder why we sometimes have black cats around us? Aside from having company, having a black cat around a Witch's Cauldron adds a 25%% chance of granting an extra brew!
